title: Grain Storage | Storage Hygiene and Structural Treatments

tasks.task: Participate in a grain storage webinar on hygiene and structural treatments.
subtasks: Define the role of hygiene and structural treatments in grain storage.
Present research findings on the rapid breeding of grain pests.
Identify common insect harbor areas around the farm.
Emphasize the importance of timely hygiene practices before temperatures rise.
Explain the use of diatomaceous earth (DE) as a structural treatment.
Demonstrate the application process for DE in silos.
Discuss alternative structural treatments for outdoor areas.
